data.name: SteamWorld Dig 2 OST Feat. El Huervo
data.detailed_description:
A musical backdrop fit for a miner


From the wild mind of El Huervo of Hotline Miami fame, this album expands on the soul of the first instalment. Let the SteamWorld Dig 2 soundtrack embrace you with its personal and atmospheric harmonies.

Track list and credits:


1. Dorothy’s Theme (SWD2 Main Theme)
2. Anfang
3. Desert Calling
4. Light of Guidance
5. Nip Tucked Dreams
6. New Heights in El Machino
7. Notation
8. Nocturnal
9. Yarrow
10. Precipice
11. Ghosts from the Past
12. Infernal Destroyer
13. The Great Prophet
14. Backtrack to Guidance
15. Abandoned Sanctuary
16. Bad to Worse
17. No Roses for the Wicked
18. I know you will
19. Moonbird
20. Oh Dorothy (Extended Main Theme)

Tracks 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 9, 10, 12, 14
Music by El Huervo
Guitar by Shelby Cinca
Bass by Dennis Wedin

Tracks 5, 8, 11, 13, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19
Music by Pelle Cahndlerby

Tracks 1, 20
Dorothy’s Theme and Oh Dorothy composed by Pelle Cahndlerby and Mikael Norrgård, produced by El Huervo
Performed by DDWIP and El Huervo
Guitar by Shelby Cinca
Bass by Dennis Wedin

How to access the audio files:


Right-click SteamWorld Dig 2 in your Steam games list, select "Properties", select the tab "Local Files", and press the button "Browse Local Files". Happy listening!
